TopicTitle: Aerotech Industries: Star Trek, AI Fleet, Helos, Ships, Spaceplanes and more!

Articles.Content:
Welcome to Aerotech Industries. Feel free to discuss anything about our products here.

Disclaimers

*Available to approved military and government contractors only

*(Most)Computer cores, sensors, and cameras removed to be compatible with all assembly bays and comply with all export restrictions

*Avionics packages available upon request

*Support and rescue contracts void beyond Kerbin SOI

Be aware that some models require manually choosing "control from here" on a forward facing command module or probe. Some of these are buried within the vehicle out of necessity. Quicksaving will save your changes here.

Please Post here if you have any problems, particularly with handling. Some SAS units need to be updated to ASAS because of .24 but I can do that easily if you let me know.

Mods Required (not all needed for every model):

Mechjeb - http://kerbal.curseforge.com/ksp-mods/220221-mechjeb

KSPI - http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/43839-0-23-5-KSP-Interstellar-%28Toolbar-Integration-New-Models-New-Tech%29-Version-0-11

Infernal Robotics - http://kerbal.curseforge.com/ksp-mods/220267-magic-smoke-industries-infernal-robotics-v0-14

Firespitter - http://kerbal.curseforge.com/ksp-mods/220252-firespitter

AKS Weapons Pack - http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/63678-WIP-0-23-AKSTechnologies-Weapons-Pack-%28release-very-soon%29?highlight=aks

IDSkillFull Weapons - http://kerbal.curseforge.com/ksp-mods/220283-skillful-weapons-and-damage

Pirated Weaponry - http://kerbal.curseforge.com/ksp-mods/220651-pirated-weaponry-revive

Sunbeam Lazor - http://kerbal.curseforge.com/ksp-mods/220276-sunbeam

DYJMISC GAU-19 - http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/42189-0-22-GatlingGun-mod?highlight=dyjmisc

Oh my god, now that's a lot of work here!

And a lot of clipping... and mods. hehehe

I admire your patience.

Oh my god, now that's a lot of work here!

And a lot of clipping... and mods. hehehe

I admire your patience.

Thanks for your reply. There are a lot of mods total, but mainly just KSPI is used. I don't use the clipping feature in the cheat menu either.

I wanted to add that the X-Wing has been updated from what is shown in the picture to a more authentic look. The wings are longer and the cockpit is set further back. I was forced to rebuild it before the release anyway along with several other ships that used KSPI because they were corrupted in .24. The album just did not get updated. Another corruption problem in .24 had to do with IDSkillFull weapons. Be careful using that mod when building new craft, but these should not be affected.

I also have a lot of commercial spaceplanes, land vehicles, assemblies and some buildings but I did not want to clutter up the post further. If anyone is looking for something specific, I can see if I can put something together.

Finally, if you have never used KSPI before you will need to find a way to fill up your antimatter supply, manage your reactor output and as mentioned above make sure your computers are aligned and working.

Action Group scheme for all vehicles:

1 - VTOL switch

2 - Main switch

3 - VTOL switch propellant

4 - Main switch propellant

5 - Warp engage

6 - Warp disengage

7 - Radiator switch

That's awsome I have made a stock shuttle craft well I believe it's stock it's functional but need the infinite fuel maybe unbreakable joints and no crash damage but probably not but I made it for the sifi shipyard by starvisions uss enterprise. But nice shuttle I'm going to download it.
